title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) behind a simple REST/CLI API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (npm: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model (docker-compose ready).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting, pulling, listing and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune, quantize, deploy & benchmark Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API (npm: ollama-node).

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama models inside CI pipelines for testing & summarization.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client & CLI for Ollama (crates.io: ollama-rs).

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed helpers (pkg.go.dev).

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs: C#, Ruby, PHP, Dart, Swift, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, images-to-text and moderates using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Curated collection of community-modified GGUF models tested with Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.
